## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                             | Type                                  | Default       |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If `true`, the button will be disabled. | `boolean`                             | `false`       |
| `kind`     | `kind`     | The kind to use.                        | `"contained" \| "outlined" \| "text"` | `'contained'` |
